Articles.Content:
I am quite new at the game so my best feat is landing on minmus (Though i never made it back), but since the new 1.0 update, i have wanted to build a ship that can fly to the moon, refill, and fly off to minmus and come back. So thats what i did

I have a lot of changes to make, but it was successful at my mission on the first attempt so i am happy

Welcome to the forum, RedHyphen. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

For your pictures to be displayed here, though, you will need to upload them to a picture hosting site such as Imgur.com. It's free and you don't even need an account. What you will need, though, is to copy the BBCode link they provide into your posts here.
